文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_008_chunk5
证据片段: the corrosion of Zircaloy in water reactors is dependent on the water chemistry of the primary coolant and the fast neutron flux

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_008_chunk5
证据片段: Under standard pressurized water reactor (PWR) coolant conditions with hydrogen overpressure, resulting in a low oxygen content in the primary coolant, the fast neutron flux has no measurable influence on the corrosion rate

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_008_chunk5
证据片段: Under oxygenated coolant conditions, typically for boiling water reactors (BWRs), the corrosion is enhanced by the fast neutron flux from the early beginning

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_008_chunk5
证据片段: Three different types of oxide have been observed

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_008_chunk5
证据片段: The dimensional behavior of Zircaloy under irradiation is governed by two processes: creep and growth

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_008_chunk5
证据片段: Creep is dependent on fast neutron flux and saturates with time

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_008_chunk5
证据片段: Both in-pile creep and growth depend on the amount in recrystallization of the material

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_008_chunk5
证据片段: In the Kraftwerk Union (KWU) water reactors Zircaloy is used as cladding material for fuel rods as well as for structural assembly components

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_008_chunk5
证据片段: postirradiation examinations were performed on more than a thousand standard fuel rods of delivered first cores and reloads

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_008_chunk5
证据片段: special pathfinder fuel rods with modified cladding and fuel properties were irradiated and examined
